name: Spaghetti Puttanesca
keywords: Pasta, Spaghetti, Olives, Capers, Tomato, Anchovies, Chili, Easy, Quick, Cheese, Italian, Spicy, Salty, Tangy, Mediterranean, Seafood Pasta, Date Night, Easy Dinner, Pantry Staple
description: An incredibly easy and quick to make spaghetti that is full of amazing salty goodness.
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup Kalamata Olives, drained, chopped and pitted

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large pan and start frying the garlic, anchovies and chili. Fry until garlic starts to brown. Add in the capers and olives, mix everything together and fry for another 30s. Add in the tomatoes and simmer.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook sauce

recipeInstructions.text: While the sauce simmers cook your spaghetti until almost done, drain and add it to the sauce. Mix everything together, season with salt and pepper to taste, mix through about 1 tbsp of shredded parmesan.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook spaghetti

recipeInstructions.text: Serve topped with extra parmesan and enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Serve

notes: Great with about 50g of butter added at the step where you add capers.Also great topped with a bit of lemon juice/zest and/or chopped parsley.
